data.title: This New Ridley Scott Movie Starring Matt Damon & Adam Driver Looks Pretty Cool. See The Trailer Now.
authors: East Side Dave // Co-Host Of The Morning Rat Race
data.meta_description: Ridley Scott, the acclaimed director of Gladiator, Alien, Blade Runner, Black Hawk Down, and more is back with a new movie...and it looks pretty cool!
data.text:
Ridley Scott, the acclaimed director of Gladiator, Alien, Blade Runner, Black Hawk Down, and more is back with a new movie…and it looks pretty cool!

The film, called The Last Duel, will star Matt Damon and Adam Driver among others.

According to the film’s description, the picture is “a tale of betrayal & vengeance set against the brutality of 14th century France.”

The Last Duel comes out on October 15th! Check out the trailer below!

– East Side Dave

“East Side” Dave McDonald has been the co-host of The Morning Rat Race for the past ten years. A lifelong Monmouth County resident, Davey Mac was raised in Spring Lake and graduated from Monmouth University. Additionally, Davey Mac co-hosts The East Side Dave and Son Wrestling Show (which is available on WRAT.com and is nationally syndicated by Beasley Digital Media). Davey Mac is a mega-sports fan, crazy wrestling enthusiast, Star Wars obsessive, rock and roll freak, and all-around Pop Culture nut. From the hottest streaming shows to the best in live sports, Dave tries to watch everything.
